RelatedSentence: The Danish Business Authority said it is starting a new consultation over subsidies for the provision of broadband services on the island of Bornholm , after it made two key changes to the model .

RelatedSentence: The Danish Business Authority said it is starting a new consultation over subsidies for the provision of broadband services on the island of Bornholm , after it made two key changes to the model .

A1: the allocation of points per address
RelatedSentence: One concerns the allocation of points per address served and the other concerns the list of addresses .
One concerns the allocation of points per address served and the other concerns the list of addresses .
The other change concerns the inclusion of summer cabins in the supply list .
Some 10,500 first homes , businesses and summer cabins are included in the list , and the authority welcomes information about addresses that ought to be added to or removed from the list .
